title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: Strategies for Supporting Science Learning for Students with Disabilities Using Generative AI

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Develops the ability to design science-subject-tailored learning materials (visual aids, simplified explanations, etc.) using generative AI
Can propose three or more AI-generated content adaptation strategies tailored to the learning needs of students with disabilities
Can identify and apply two or more ethical considerations when utilizing generative AI in science classes
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
